_comment: Precondition rules for ACE Pelican error codes. Auto-generate with: generate_precondition_rules()

8001.description: Invalid BIC - requires BIC to be present

8004.description: IBAN cannot be derived - requires country that needs IBAN

8022.description: IBAN inconsistent with BIC - requires both IBAN and BIC present

8026.description: NCH inconsistency - requires NCH/routing number present

8030.description: IBAN derivation not supported - requires IBAN country

8852.description: Incorrect length of attribute - requires account present

8892.description: Invalid account number - requires account present

8895.description: Invalid NCH code - requires NCH present

8896.description: Invalid domestic account - requires account present

8898.description: IBAN check digit failed - requires IBAN present

9004.description: IBAN derived for credit party - requires IBAN country

9005.description: BIC derived from NCH - requires NCH present

9007.description: IBAN derived for beneficiary - requires IBAN country

9008.description: BIC derived from IBAN - requires IBAN present

9025.description: Account length fixed - requires account present

9477.description: BIC enriched 8->11 chars - requires BIC present

9479.description: Party enriched from BIC directory - requires BIC
